data.prayer: Over 90.8 percent of the people of Liaoyuan are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Liaoyuan, Jilin, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Liaoyuan, Jilin, China will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 47,982 believers in Liaoyuan that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Liaoyuan, Jilin, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Xibe people might believe through him.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Liaoyuan, Jilin, China by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Liaoyuan. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.section_summary:
the county of Liaoyuan, Jilin, China has a population of 632,500.

We estimate Liaoyuan has 47,982 people who might know Jesus, 10,218 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 574,300 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 47,982 believers in Liaoyuan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
